The information required in the remainder of this cover page shall not be deemed to be &#147;filed&#148; for the purpose of Section&nbsp;18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#147;Act&#148;) or otherwise subject to the liabilities of that section of the Act but shall be subject to all other provisions of the Act (however, see the Notes). &nbsp; CUSIP No. G6683N103 &nbsp;&nbsp; SCHEDULE 13G/A &nbsp;&nbsp; Page 7 of 9 &nbsp; Item&#8201;3. If this statement is filed pursuant to Rule 13d-1(b) or 13d-2(b) or (c), check whether the person filing is a: &nbsp; (a) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; Broker or dealer registered under Section&nbsp;15 of the Act (15 U.S.C. 78o); (b) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; Bank as defined in Section&nbsp;3(a)(6) of the Act (15 U.S.C. 78c); (c) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; Insurance company as defined in Section&nbsp;3(a)(19) of the Act (15 U.S.C. 78c); (d) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; Investment company registered under Section&nbsp;8 of the Investment Company Act of 1940 (15 U.S.C. 80a-8); (e) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; An investment adviser in accordance with &#167;240.13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(E); (f) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; An employee benefit plan or endowment fund in accordance with &#167;240.13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(F); (g) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; A parent holding company or control person in accordance with &#167;240.13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(G); (h) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; A savings association as defined in Section&nbsp;3(b) of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act (12 U.S.C. 1813); (i) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; A church plan that is excluded from the definition of an investment company under section 3(c)(14) of the Investment Company Act of 1940 (15 U.S.C. 80a-3); (j) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; A non-U.S. institution in accordance with Rule 13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(J); (k) &nbsp;&nbsp; &#9744; &nbsp;&nbsp; Group, in accordance with Rule 13d-1(b)(1)(ii)(K). Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&#8201;4. Ownership. Provide the following information regarding the aggregate number and percentage of the class of securities of issuer identified in Item 1. (a) The information required by Items 4(a) is set forth in Row (9)&nbsp;of the cover page for each Reporting Person and is incorporated herein by reference. (b) The information required by Items 4(b) is set forth in Row (11)&nbsp;of the cover page for each Reporting Person and is incorporated herein by reference. Percent of class determined is based on 3,671,597,558 Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Shares of the Issuer outstanding as reported in the current report on Form 6-K filed by the Issuer with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#147;SEC&#148;) on November&nbsp;14, 2023. Tencent Holdings Limited may be deemed to have beneficial ownership over 237,294,069 Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Shares held of record by Huang River Investment Limited, a company incorporated in the British Virgin Islands wholly owned by Tencent Holdings Limited. Tencent Holdings Limited may also be deemed to have beneficial ownership over 7,418,920 Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Shares held of record by Silver Alternative Holding Limited, a company incorporated in the Cayman Islands controlled by Tencent Holdings Limited. (c) The information required by Items 4(c) is set forth in Rows (5)-(8) of the cover page for each Reporting Person and is incorporated herein by reference. &nbsp; Item&#8201;5. Ownership of Five Percent or Less of a Class. As of December&nbsp;31, 2023, each of Tencent Cloud Europe B.V., Aceville Ptd. Ltd. and TCH Delta Limited ceased to be the beneficial owner of more than five percent of the Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Shares. &nbsp; Item&#8201;6. Ownership of More than Five Percent on Behalf of Another Person. Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&#8201;7. Identification and Classification of the Subsidiary Which Acquired the Security Being Reported on by the Parent Holding Company or Control Person. Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&#8201;8. Identification and Classification of Members of the Group. Not applicable. CUSIP No. G6683N103 &nbsp;&nbsp; SCHEDULE 13G/A &nbsp;&nbsp; Page 8 of 9 &nbsp; Item&#8201;9. Notice of Dissolution of Group. Not applicable. &nbsp; Item&#8201;10. Certification. Not applicable.
